name: Submarimon
effect: ＜Armor Purge＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may trash the top card of this Digimon to prevent that deletion.)[When Digivolving] Trash the bottom digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards gets -3000 DP for the turn.
